title: Token.identityRegistry points to IdentityRegistry
desc: Token must reference the IdentityRegistry used by ERC-3643 flow

title: IdentityRegistry wired with ClaimTopicsRegistry
desc: IdentityRegistry must point to the expected ClaimTopicsRegistry

title: Token transfers are KYC-gated (sanity)
desc: If IdentityRegistry is zero or missing getter, flag

title: Claim topics exist
desc: ClaimTopicsRegistry has at least one topic

title: IdentityRegistry wired with TrustedIssuersRegistry
desc: IdentityRegistry must point to the expected TrustedIssuersRegistry

title: Compliance module bound to token
desc: Token.compliance() must return the deployed compliance contract and it must be bound to the token
